testimonials.name: Grid Testimonials Cards
testimonials.description: Clean grid layout with testimonial cards and star ratings

testimonials.name: Testimonials Carousel Slider
testimonials.description: Interactive carousel with large testimonials and navigation

testimonials.name: Simple Centered Testimonials
testimonials.description: Clean centered testimonials with minimal design

testimonials.name: Service Results Testimonials
testimonials.description: Customer testimonials focused on project outcomes and satisfaction
testimonials.template:
import Image from 'next/image' import { Star, CheckCircle, Calendar, DollarSign } from 'lucide-react' export default function Testimonials() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Real Projects, Real Results", description: "See what our customers have to say about the quality of our work and the results we deliver.", testimonials: [ { quote: "They completely transformed our outdated kitchen into a modern masterpiece. The project was completed on time, on budget, and exceeded our expectations.", author: "Jennifer Martinez", role: "Homeowner", location: "West Hills", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", projectType: "Kitchen Renovation", duration: "2 weeks", satisfaction: "100%", result: "Increased home value by $30,000" }, { quote: "Emergency plumbing disaster on Sunday night - they were here in 20 minutes! Professional, honest pricing, and got our water back on quickly.", author: "Robert Chen", role: "Homeowner", location: "Downtown", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", projectType: "Emergency Repair", duration: "2 hours", satisfaction: "100%", result: "Saved $2,000 vs other quotes" }, { quote: "From permit to completion, they handled everything professionally. The new bathroom is absolutely beautiful and the craftsmanship is exceptional.", author: "Sarah Thompson", role: "Homeowner", location: "North Valley", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", projectType: "Bathroom Remodel", duration: "10 days", satisfaction: "100%", result: "Dream bathroom achieved" } ] } return (

{data.headline}

{data.description}

{data.testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
{/* Project Type Badge */}
{testimonial.projectType}
{[...Array(testimonial.rating)].map((_, i) => ( ))}

"{testimonial.quote}"

{/* Project Results */}
{testimonial.duration}
{testimonial.satisfaction}
{testimonial.result}

{testimonial.author}

{testimonial.role}

{testimonial.location}

))}
100% Customer Satisfaction • Licensed & Insured • Local Experts
) }

testimonials.name: Trust & Local Community Testimonials
testimonials.description: Community-focused testimonials with local customer emphasis and trust indicators
testimonials.template:
import Image from 'next/image' import { Star, MapPin, Heart, Users, Home, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react' export default function Testimonials() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Trusted by Our Neighbors", description: "We're proud to be part of this community. Here's what our local customers have to say about our service.", communityStats: { yearsInCommunity: "15+", localCustomers: "500+", neighborhoodsServed: "12", referralRate: "85%" }, testimonials: [ { quote: "I've used them three times now - always reliable, always fair pricing. It's nice to have a local company you can trust.", author: "Tom Wilson", role: "Homeowner", neighborhood: "Oak Grove", yearsAsCustomer: "5 years", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500648767791-00dcc994a43e?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", serviceType: "Repeat Customer" }, { quote: "My neighbor recommended them and I'm so glad they did! Professional work, cleaned up after themselves, and very reasonable prices.", author: "Linda Martinez", role: "Homeowner", neighborhood: "Maple Heights", yearsAsCustomer: "2 years", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", serviceType: "Neighbor Referral" }, { quote: "Family-owned business that treats you like family. They've been taking care of our rental properties for years - always dependable.", author: "David Rodriguez", role: "Property Owner", neighborhood: "Downtown", yearsAsCustomer: "8 years", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", serviceType: "Long-term Client" }, { quote: "When you find a contractor who shows up on time, does quality work, and charges fair prices, you stick with them. Highly recommend!", author: "Susan Park", role: "Homeowner", neighborhood: "Riverside", yearsAsCustomer: "3 years", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1573496359142-b8d87734a5a2?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", serviceType: "Loyal Customer" } ] } return (
Proudly Serving Our Community

{data.description}

{/* Community Stats */}
{data.communityStats.yearsInCommunity}
Years Local
{data.communityStats.localCustomers}

{data.communityStats.neighborhoodsServed}
Neighborhoods
{data.communityStats.referralRate}
Referral Rate
{data.testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
{testimonial.serviceType}
{[...Array(testimonial.rating)].map((_, i) => ( ))}

"{testimonial.quote}"

testimonials.name: Emergency & Reliability Testimonials
testimonials.description: Customer testimonials emphasizing quick response and reliable emergency service
testimonials.template:
import Image from 'next/image' import { Star, Clock, Phone, Shield, CheckCircle, AlertTriangle } from 'lucide-react' export default function Testimonials() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "When Emergencies Strike, We Deliver", description: "Real stories from customers who needed us most - during emergencies, late nights, and urgent situations.", emergencyStats: { avgResponseTime: "25 min", availability: "24/7/365", emergencyCallsAnswered: "99.8%", customerSatisfaction: "4.9/5" }, testimonials: [ { quote: "2 AM pipe burst, water everywhere. Called them and they answered immediately. Technician arrived in 15 minutes and saved our hardwood floors!", author: "Mark Johnson", role: "Homeowner", timeOfCall: "2:15 AM", responseTime: "15 minutes", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500648767791-00dcc994a43e?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", emergencyType: "Pipe Burst" }, { quote: "Christmas Eve electrical emergency - no power in half the house. They came out same day and had us up and running before dinner. True professionals!", author: "Patricia Davis", role: "Homeowner", timeOfCall: "Christmas Eve", responseTime: "2 hours", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", emergencyType: "Power Outage" }, { quote: "AC died during the hottest day of summer. They prioritized my call as an emergency and had a new unit installed the next day. Lifesavers!", author: "Robert Kim", role: "Homeowner", timeOfCall: "Weekend", responseTime: "1 hour", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", emergencyType: "AC Failure" } ] } return (
24/7 EMERGENCY SERVICE

{data.headline}

{data.description}

{/* Emergency Performance Stats */}
{data.emergencyStats.avgResponseTime}
Avg Response
{data.emergencyStats.availability}
Always Available
{data.emergencyStats.emergencyCallsAnswered}
Calls Answered
{data.emergencyStats.customerSatisfaction}
Satisfaction
{data.testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
{/* Emergency Details */}

Emergency Details

Emergency: {testimonial.emergencyType}
Time of Call: {testimonial.timeOfCall}
Response: {testimonial.responseTime}
{/* Testimonial Content */}
{[...Array(testimonial.rating)].map((_, i) => ( ))}

"{testimonial.quote}"

{testimonial.author}

{testimonial.role}

{testimonial.neighborhood} • Customer for {testimonial.yearsAsCustomer}
))}

) }

testimonials.name: Professional Credentials Testimonials
testimonials.description: Testimonials emphasizing professionalism, expertise, and industry credentials
testimonials.template:
import Image from 'next/image' import { Star, Award, Shield, CheckCircle, Users, Briefcase } from 'lucide-react' export default function Testimonials() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Professional Excellence Recognized", description: "Our commitment to professional standards and quality craftsmanship speaks for itself through our customers' experiences.", credentials: { yearsExperience: "25+", certifications: "12", industryAwards: "5", licensedStates: "3" }, testimonials: [ { quote: "As a general contractor myself, I'm very particular about subcontractors. Their attention to detail and professional standards are exactly what you want on a high-end project.", author: "Michael Torres", role: "General Contractor", company: "Torres Construction", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", projectValue: "$85,000", credentialFocus: "Industry Professional" }, { quote: "The level of craftsmanship is outstanding. Every detail was perfect, from the initial consultation to the final walkthrough. True professionals who take pride in their work.", author: "Elizabeth Harper", role: "Interior Designer", company: "Harper Design Studio", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1573496359142-b8d87734a5a2?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", projectValue: "$45,000", credentialFocus: "Quality Craftsmanship" }, { quote: "Permits, inspections, code compliance - they handled everything flawlessly. It's rare to find contractors who are both skilled tradespeople and business professionals.", author: "James Patterson", role: "Property Manager", company: "Premier Properties", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500648767791-00dcc994a43e?w=400&h=400&fit=crop", projectValue: "$120,000", credentialFocus: "Code Compliance Expert" } ] } return (
CERTIFIED PROFESSIONALS

{data.headline}

{data.description}

{/* Professional Credentials */}
{data.credentials.yearsExperience}
Years Experience
{data.credentials.certifications}
Certifications
{data.credentials.industryAwards}
Industry Awards
{data.credentials.licensedStates}
Licensed States
{data.testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
{/* Customer Info */}

{testimonial.author}

{testimonial.role}

{testimonial.company}

{[...Array(testimonial.rating)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
{/* Testimonial Content */}

{testimonial.credentialFocus}

"{testimonial.quote}"

))}
